name: Incident report national return rate
description: Rate of reports being returned to reporting officers by data wardens for whole prison estate.

dataset.name: Return rate for whole prison estate per month
dataset.query:
select month, min_date, max_date, all_reports, returned, dw_not_seen, closed, 
CASE WHEN (all_reports-dw_not_seen) = 0 THEN 0.0 
ELSE ROUND((CAST(returned as numeric)/(all_reports-dw_not_seen))*100, 1) 
END as dw_seen_percentage_returned
from (
select Cast(Date_trunc('month', r.incident_date_and_time) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(r.incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(r.incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date, count(r.id) as all_reports, 
count(CASE WHEN cr.requested_corection = '1' THEN r.id END) as returned,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('DRAFT', 'AWAITING_REVIEW') THEN r.id END) as dw_not_seen,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('CLOSED', 'DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE') THEN r.id END) as closed
from report as r
left join (
select DISTINCT report_id, '1' as requested_corection
from correction_request
where user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION') as cr
on r.id = cr.report_id
where r.source = 'DPS'
group by Date_trunc('month', r.incident_date_and_time))

dataset.name: Return rate for whole prison estate per year
dataset.query:
select year, min_date, max_date, all_reports, returned, dw_not_seen, closed, 
CASE WHEN (all_reports-dw_not_seen) = 0 THEN 0.0 
ELSE ROUND((CAST(returned as numeric)/(all_reports-dw_not_seen))*100, 1) 
END as dw_seen_percentage_returned
from (
select Cast(Date_trunc('year', incident_date_and_time) AS DATE) as year, to_char(min(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date, count(r.id) as all_reports, 
count(CASE WHEN cr.requested_corection = '1' THEN r.id END) as returned,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('DRAFT', 'AWAITING_REVIEW') THEN r.id END) as dw_not_seen,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('CLOSED', 'DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE') THEN r.id END) as closed
from report as r
left join (
select DISTINCT report_id, '1' as requested_corection
from correction_request
where user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION') as cr
on r.id = cr.report_id
where r.source = 'DPS'
group by Date_trunc('year', r.incident_date_and_time))

dataset.name: Return rate per incident type per month
dataset.query:
select month, min_date, max_date, incident_type, all_reports, returned, dw_not_seen, closed, 
CASE WHEN (all_reports-dw_not_seen) = 0 THEN 0.0 
ELSE ROUND((CAST(returned as numeric)/(all_reports-dw_not_seen))*100, 1) 
END as dw_seen_percentage_returned
from (
select Cast(Date_trunc('month', incident_date_and_time) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date, ct.description as incident_type, count(r.id) as all_reports, 
count(CASE WHEN cr.requested_corection = '1' THEN r.id END) as returned,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('DRAFT', 'AWAITING_REVIEW') THEN r.id END) as dw_not_seen,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('CLOSED', 'DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE') THEN r.id END) as closed
from report as r
left join (
select DISTINCT report_id, '1' as requested_corection
from correction_request
where user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION') as cr
on r.id = cr.report_id
left join (
select code, description
from constant_type
) as ct
on r.type = ct.code
where r.source = 'DPS'
group by Date_trunc('month', r.incident_date_and_time), ct.description)

dataset.name: Return rate per incident type per year
dataset.query:
select year, min_date, max_date, incident_type, all_reports, returned, dw_not_seen, closed, 
CASE WHEN (all_reports-dw_not_seen) = 0 THEN 0.0 
ELSE ROUND((CAST(returned as numeric)/(all_reports-dw_not_seen))*100, 1) 
END as dw_seen_percentage_returned
from (
select Cast(Date_trunc('year', incident_date_and_time) AS DATE) as year, to_char(min(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date, ct.description as incident_type, count(r.id) as all_reports, 
count(CASE WHEN cr.requested_corection = '1' THEN r.id END) as returned,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('DRAFT', 'AWAITING_REVIEW') THEN r.id END) as dw_not_seen,
count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('CLOSED', 'DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE') THEN r.id END) as closed
from report as r
left join (
select DISTINCT report_id, '1' as requested_corection
from correction_request
where user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION') as cr
on r.id = cr.report_id
left join (
select code, description
from constant_type
) as ct
on r.type = ct.code
where r.source = 'DPS'
group by Date_trunc('year', r.incident_date_and_time), ct.description)

report.name: % of incident reports returned / month
report.description: Percentage of incident reports returned to reporting officers by data wardens for whole prison estate per month.

field.name: $ref:dw_not_seen
field.display: Reports not yet seen by a DW

report.name: % of incident reports returned / year
report.description: Percentage of incident reports returned to reporting officers by data wardens for whole prison estate per year.

field.name: $ref:dw_not_seen
field.display: Reports not yet seen by a DW
